name: Weather application
desc: A weather forecasting web app that displays live weather updates and forecasts based on location.

name: A Stopwatch Web app
desc: A stopwatch web app that helps users keep track of time with functionalities such as start, stop, and reset.

name: Car-Care
desc: A web app for managing car care and maintenance tasks, such as oil changes, tire rotations, and service reminders.

name: Tic-Tac-Toe
desc: A simple web-based Tic-Tac-Toe game where two players can play against each other in a 3x3 grid.
